channel.title: RSC Clients now Legal under DMCA
channel.description:
https://supporters.eff.org/civicrm/mailing/view?reset=1&id=1234
EFF also won an exemption for users who want to play video games after the publisher cuts off support. For example, some players may need to modify an old video game so it doesn’t perform a check with an authentication server that has since been shut down.

item.title: RSC Clients now Legal under DMCA
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

Justin Bieber:

oh biebs… and this article means nothing to games that are still under copyright and still have functioning auth servers and are still generating revenue.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Clients now Legal under DMCA
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

[quote=“Justin Bieber, post:10, topic:553682”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=672603.msg4498136#msg4498136 date=1446338272]

[quote author=Justin Bieber link=topic=672603.msg4497992#msg4497992 date=1446107986]
this sounds like its aimed at people who want to play offline games that rely on an auth check, not reverse engineering a whole game and reimplementing their backend game logic.
[/quote]The “reimplemented backend logic” (rewritten server) was always legal.
[/quote]I said it sounds like this legislation isn’t aimed at people who reverse engineer a whole game and reimplement their backend game logic. That doesn’t imply that reimplementing backend game logic is illegal.[/quote]

This is why nobody likes you Bieber, just a tool.

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Clients now Legal under DMCA

item.title: RSC Clients now Legal under DMCA
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:9, topic:553682”][quote author=Justin Bieber link=topic=672603.msg4497992#msg4497992 date=1446107986]
this sounds like its aimed at people who want to play offline games that rely on an auth check, not reverse engineering a whole game and reimplementing their backend game logic.
[/quote]The “reimplemented backend logic” (rewritten server) was always legal.[/quote]I said it sounds like this legislation isn’t aimed at people who reverse engineer a whole game and reimplement their backend game logic. That doesn’t imply that reimplementing backend game logic is illegal.

Read full topic
